text: Saulius Sondeckis (11 October 1928 - 3 February 2016) was a Lithuanian violinist, conductor, orchestra leader and professor. He founded the Lithuanian Chamber Orchestra in 1960 and was its artistic director and principal conductor until 2004. Sondeckis was born in Å iauliai, Lithuania. He studied at Lithuanian Academy of Music and Theatre. Sondeckis died in Vilnius from a stroke on 3 February 2016. He was aged 87. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Lithuanian musicians Category:Violinists Category:Conductors Category:Lithuanian educators
title: Saulius Sondeckis
